mapper.sql: titl_id, titl_name, t_id, titl_source, titl_type, titl_describe, titl_state, sel_state
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from title
order by ${orderByClause}

select titl_id, titl_name, teacher.t_id, t_name, titl_source,titl_describe, titl_type, titl_state ,sel_state,title.major from title ,teacher WHERE title.t_id = teacher.t_id and titl_name like "%"#{titlName}"%" and title.major = #{major} and titl_state = '已审批'

select titl_id, titl_name, teacher.t_id, t_name, titl_source,titl_describe, titl_type, titl_state ,sel_state,title.major from title ,teacher WHERE title.t_id = teacher.t_id and title.major = #{major} and titl_state = '已审批'
SELECT * from selTitleInfo where s_id = #{sId} and titl_Name like "%"#{titlName}"%"
SELECT * from selTitleInfo where s_id = #{sId}
SELECT * from selTitleInfo where s_id = #{sId} and seltitl_state = '同意'

select titl_id, titl_name, teacher.t_id, t_name, titl_source,titl_describe, titl_type, titl_state ,title.major from title ,teacher where titl_id = #{titlId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and title.t_id = teacher.t_id
mapper.insert: insert into title (titl_id, titl_name, t_id, titl_source, titl_type, titl_describe, titl_state, sel_state, major) values (#{titlId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{titlName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{titlSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{titlType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{titlDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{titlState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{selState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into title
titl_id,
titl_name,
t_id,
titl_source,
titl_type,
titl_describe,
titl_state,
sel_state,
#{titlId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{titlName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{titlSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{titlType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{titlDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{titlState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{selState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select: select count(*) from title
mapper.update:
update title
titl_id = #{record.titlId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
titl_name = #{record.titlName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_id = #{record.tId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
titl_source = #{record.titlSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
titl_type = #{record.titlType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
titl_describe = #{record.titlDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
titl_state = #{record.titlState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sel_state = #{record.selState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update title set titl_id = #{record.titlId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, titl_name = #{record.titlName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t_id = #{record.tId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, titl_source = #{record.titlSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, titl_type = #{record.titlType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, titl_describe = #{record.titlDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, titl_state = #{record.titlState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sel_state = #{record.selState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update title
titl_name = #{titlName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t_id = #{tId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
titl_source = #{titlSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
titl_type = #{titlType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
titl_describe = #{titlDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
titl_state = #{titlState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sel_state = #{selState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where titl_id = #{titlId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update title set titl_name = #{titlName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t_id = #{tId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, titl_source = #{titlSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, titl_type = #{titlType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, titl_describe = #{titlDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, titl_state = #{titlState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sel_state = #{selState,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where titl_id = #{titlId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select count(*) from title where major=#{major} and titl_state=#{titlState}
select count(*) from title where t_id=#{tId} and titl_state=#{titlState}
select count(*) from title where major=#{major} and sel_state=#{selState}

select title.titl_id, title.titl_name, title.t_id, title.titl_source, title.titl_type, title.titl_describe, title.titl_state, title.sel_state, title.major, a.s_id, a.t_score, a.t_comments, a.reply_score, a.reply_comments, a.s_name from title Left Join (select * from ss where seltitl_state='同意' or seltitl_state='待专业负责人审批')as a on title.titl_id = a.titl_id where t_id = #{tId} and titl_name like "%"#{titlName}"%" order by field(titl_state,"已审批","待审批","审批不通过"),title.titl_id

select * from sss Left Join (select * from ss where seltitl_state='同意'or seltitl_state='待专业负责人审批')as a on sss.titl_id = a.titl_id where t_id = #{tId} order by field(titl_state,"已审批","待审批","审批不通过"),sss.titl_id
select * from sss Left Join (select * from ss where seltitl_state='同意')as a on sss.titl_id = a.titl_id where t_id = #{tId} and titl_state = '已审批' order by a.s_id desc
select * from title where titl_name like "%"#{titlName}"%" and t_id = #{tId} and titl_state =#{titlState} order by titl_state DESC
select * from title where t_id = #{tId} and titl_state =#{titlState} order by titl_state DESC

select sss.titl_id, sss.titl_name, sss.t_id, sss.titl_source, sss.titl_type, sss.titl_describe, sss.titl_state, sss.sel_state, sss.major, a.s_id, a.t_score, a.t_comments, a.reply_score, a.reply_comments, a.s_name from sss Left Join (select * from ss where seltitl_state='同意')as a on sss.titl_id = a.titl_id where titl_name like "%"#{titlName}"%" and sss.major = #{major} and sss.titl_state != #{titlState} and sss.titl_state != '待指导教师审批' ORDER BY field(sss.titl_state,"已审批","审批不通过"),sss.sel_state

select * from sss Left Join (select * from ss where seltitl_state='同意')as a on sss.titl_id = a.titl_id where sss.major = #{major} and sss.titl_state != #{titlState} and sss.titl_state != '待指导教师审批' ORDER BY field(sss.titl_state,"已审批","审批不通过"),sss.sel_state

select sss.titl_id, sss.titl_name, sss.t_id, sss.titl_source, sss.titl_type, sss.titl_describe, sss.titl_state, sss.sel_state, sss.major, a.s_id, a.t_score, a.t_comments, a.reply_score, a.reply_comments, a.s_name from sss Left Join (select * from ss where seltitl_state='同意')as a on sss.titl_id = a.titl_id where titl_name like "%"#{titlName}"%" and sss.major = #{major} and sss.titl_state = #{titlState} ORDER BY field(sss.titl_state,"已审批","审批不通过"),sss.sel_state

select * from sss Left Join (select * from ss where seltitl_state='同意')as a on sss.titl_id = a.titl_id where sss.major = #{major} and sss.titl_state = #{titlState} ORDER BY field(sss.titl_state,"已审批","审批不通过"),sss.sel_state
mapper.update: update title set titl_state = #{titlState} where titl_id = #{titlId}
mapper.select: select sss.titl_id, sss.titl_name, sss.t_id, sss.titl_source, sss.titl_type, sss.titl_describe, sss.titl_state, sss.sel_state, sss.major, a.s_id, a.t_score, a.t_comments, a.reply_score, a.reply_comments, a.s_name from sss Left Join (select * from ss where seltitl_state='同意')as a on sss.titl_id = a.titl_id where titl_state = '已审批' and titl_name like "%"#{titlName}"%" and sss.major=#{major} order by a.s_name desc
select * from sss Left Join (select * from ss where seltitl_state='同意')as a on sss.titl_id = a.titl_id where titl_state = '已审批' and sss.major=#{major} order by a.s_name desc
select * from (select * from ss where seltitl_state='同意' )as a Left Join sss on sss.titl_id = a.titl_id where titl_state = '已审批' and sss.major=#{major} order by a.s_name desc
mapper.update: update title set major = #{major} where major = #{oldName}
